text: agar tum zaqmi hoye ho, to tumhaare muqaalif log bhi to aise hee zaqmi ho chuke hai, hum un duno ko logo ke darmiyaan adalte badalte rehte hai (shikast uhad) is liye thi ke Allah ta’ala imaan waalo ko zaaher karde, aur tum mein se baaz ko shahaadath ka darja ata famaaye, Allah ta’ala zaalimo se muhabbath nahi karta
